Room.Name: Bendine Aquarium Octopus Tank Room
Room.ShortDescription: The Octopus Tank stands in the center of the large room you are now in.
Room.LongDescription: Octopi are not very friendly creatures, and with eight tenticals each, they tend to be very deadly. Although they are very graceful to watch, they probably don't like being disturbed. The tank lies in the center of the room.
